Package ch.framedev.metarapp.apis

Class MetarAPPApi

java.lang.Object
ch.framedev.metarapp.apis.MetarAPPApi
public class MetarAPPApi extends Object
MetarAPPApi is a class that provides methods for interacting with the MetarAPP application. It includes functionalities for retrieving METAR data, airport information, and application download links.
Author:
framedev

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static MetarAPPApi getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of MetarAPPApi. Initializes the token handler and returns the instance.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of MetarAPPApi.

    • isMetarAPIOnline

      public boolean isMetarAPIOnline()
      Checks if the MetarAPP API is online by sending a request to a specific ICAO code.
      Returns:
      True if the API is online and responding successfully, false otherwise. If an IOException occurs during the request, the method returns false.

    • isAirportAPIOnline

      public boolean isAirportAPIOnline()

    • getAllVersions

      public List<String> getAllVersions()
      Retrieves a list of all available versions of the MetarAPP application.
      Returns:
      A list of strings representing the available versions.

    • getDownloadString

      public String getDownloadString(String version)
      Returns the download link for the specified version of the MetarAPP application based on the operating system.
      Parameters:
      version - The version of the MetarAPP application.
      Returns:
      The download link for the specified version.

    • getDownloadStringAllTypes

      public String[] getDownloadStringAllTypes(String version)
      Returns an array of strings containing the download links for the specified version of the MetarAPP application. The first link is for the Windows version, and the second link is for Unix-based systems (macOS, Linux, and others).
      Parameters:
      version - The version of the MetarAPP application for which the download links are required.
      Returns:
      An array of strings containing the download links for the specified version of the MetarAPP application.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the provided version is null or empty.
      IllegalStateException - If the version is not available for download.

    • isVersionAvailable

      public boolean isVersionAvailable(String version)
      Checks if a specified version of the MetarAPP application is available for download.
      Parameters:
      version - The version of the MetarAPP application.
      Returns:
      True if the version is available for download, false otherwise.

    • getAllChangelogs

      public List<List<String>> getAllChangelogs()
      Retrieves the changelogs for all available versions of the MetarAPP application.
      Returns:
      A list of lists of strings, where each inner list contains the changelogs for a specific version.

    • getMetarRequest

      public MetarRequest getMetarRequest(String icaoCode) throws IOException
      Returns a MetarRequest object for a specified ICAO code.
      Parameters:
      icaoCode - The ICAO code for which to retrieve the METAR data.
      Returns:
      A MetarRequest object.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while creating the MetarRequest object.

    • getMetarData

      public MetarData getMetarData(String icao) throws IOException
      Retrieves the METAR data for a specified ICAO code.
      Parameters:
      icao - The ICAO code for which to retrieve the METAR data.
      Returns:
      The METAR data as a MetarData object.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while retrieving the METAR data.

    • getAirportData

      public AirportData getAirportData(String icao) throws IOException
      Retrieves the airport data for a specified ICAO code.
      Parameters:
      icao - The ICAO code for which to retrieve the airport data.
      Returns:
      The airport data as an AirportData object.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while retrieving the airport data.

    • getMetarAPPVersion

      public String getMetarAPPVersion()
      Returns the version of the MetarAPP application.
      Returns:
      The version of the MetarAPP application as a string.

    • getLatestDownloadVersion

      public String[] getLatestDownloadVersion()
      Retrieves the download links for the latest version of the MetarAPP application. The returned array contains two strings: the first link is for the Windows version, and the second link is for Unix-based systems (macOS, Linux, and others).
      Returns:
      An array of strings containing the download links for the latest version of the MetarAPP application.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception
      The main method for testing the MetarAPPApi class.
      Parameters:
      args - Command-line arguments.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during testing.

      Throws:
